title: 6Pack(3/3/6/6/6/10 FT) Original [Apple MFi Certified] iPhone Charger Fast Charging Lightning Cable iPhone Charger Cord Compatible with iPhone 14/13/12/11 Pro Max/XS MAX/XR/XS/X/8/7 Plus iPad AirPods

**6Pack Original Apple MFi Certified iPhone Charger**

**Get the Best Charging Experience for Your iPhone**

Stay connected and powered up with our 6Pack Original Apple MFi Certified iPhone Charger. This premium charger pack includes six high-quality cables in varying lengths (3ft, 3ft, 6ft, 6ft, 6ft, and 10ft) to meet all your charging needs.

**Compatibility**

Our charger is compatible with a wide range of Apple devices, including:

* iPhone 14, iPhone 14 Pro, iPhone 14 Pro Max
* iPhone 13, iPhone 12 Pro Max, iPhone 12 Pro, iPhone 12
* iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11 Pro Max, iPhone XS Max, iPhone XR, iPhone XS, iPhone X
* iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone 8, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6 Plus
* iPad Air 2, iPad mini, iPad mini 2, iPad mini 4, AirPods

**Features**

* Apple MFi Certified for guaranteed quality and safety
* Fast charging and data transfer capabilities
* Supports iOS updates and future versions
* Reinforced joint designs for enhanced durability
* Quality Copper Wire construction for reliable performance
* Multiple color options to match your personal style

**Warranty and Support**

* 1-year worry-free refund and replacement guarantee
* Dedicated customer support with response times within 24 hours

**What's in the Box**

* 6 x Apple MFi Certified iPhone Charger Cables (3ft, 3ft, 6ft, 6ft, 6ft, and 10ft)

**Order Now and Experience the Convenience of Reliable Charging!**

**Product Title:** 6-Pack Original Apple MFi Certified iPhone Charger Lightning Cable

**Product Description:**

Get the ultimate charging experience with our 6-Pack Original Apple MFi Certified iPhone Charger Lightning Cable. This premium product is designed to provide fast and reliable charging for your iPhone, iPad, or AirPods. With its Apple MFi certification, you can trust that it meets the highest standards of quality and compatibility.

**Key Features:**

* **Apple MFi Certified**: Ensures 100% compatibility with iPhone, iPad, and AirPods devices
* **Fast Charging**: Charges your device quickly and efficiently
* **Fast Data Transfer**: Supports fast data transfer between your device and computer
* **Syncing Capability**: Allows for seamless syncing of your device with your computer
* **Reinforced Joint Design**: Durable construction withstands bending and heavy use
* **Multiple Color Options**: Choose from a variety of colors to match your personal style
* **Quality Copper Wire**: Ensures maximum conductivity and minimal signal loss
* **Worry-Free Warranty**: 1-year refund and replacement guarantee provides peace of mind
* **24/7 Customer Support**: Get help within 24 hours with any questions or concerns

**Package Contents:**

* 6 x iPhone Charger Lightning Cables (3/3/6/6/6/10 FT lengths)

**Compatibility:**

* iPhone 14, 14 Pro, 14 Pro Max, 13, 12 Pro Max, 12 Pro, 12, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, XS Max, XR, XS, X, 8 Plus, 8, 7 Plus, 7, 6s Plus, 6s, 6 Plus
* iPad Air, iPad Air 2, iPad mini, iPad mini 2, iPad mini 4
* AirPods

**Order now and experience the convenience and reliability of our 6-Pack Original Apple MFi Certified iPhone Charger Lightning Cable!**
